Text: Do i need a custom firmware for this, or how exaclty do i get this to work?

oh bog the same questions in every psp torrent ... yes, you need a custom fw. no, we can't (rather, won't) help you here with that, this is a torrent site not a psp hacking site. yes, you can find help on the web. psp-hacks.com/forums is as good a place as any to start.
